suggest.ext-apc: APC extension is required to use the APC Adapter
suggest.ext-apcu: APCu extension is required to use the APCu Adapter
suggest.ext-memcache: Memcache extension is required to use the Memcache Adapter
suggest.ext-memcached: Memcached extension is required to use the Memcached Adapter
suggest.ext-redis: Redis extension is required to use the Redis adapter
suggest.ext-mongodb: Mongodb extension required to use the Mongodb adapter
suggest.mongodb/mongodb: Mongodb lib required to use the Mongodb adapter
